stories.tease: Crosswords are known for being too old, too white, and too male. We backed that up with data.
These playable mini crosswords let you get a feel for who gets included (and excluded) as clues and answers in puzzles.

author.name: Michelle McGhee
author.bio: is a Journalist-Engineer at The Pudding. She finds joy in drinking boba, singing harmonies, and automating things that could probably just be done manually.
